param.name: do_auto_name
param.label: Auto-assign
param.help: Use dataset name or collection information to automatically assign this value

param.name: ID
param.label: Read group identifier (ID)
param.help: This value must be unique among multiple samples in your experiment

param.name: SM
param.label: Read group sample name (SM)
param.help: This value should be descriptive. Use pool name where a pool is being sequenced

param.name: SM
param.label: Read group sample name (SM)
param.help: This value should be descriptive. Use pool name where a pool is being sequenced

param.name: PL
param.label: Platform/technology used to produce the reads (PL)

param.name: CN
param.label: Sequencing center that produced the read (CN)

param.name: DT
param.label: Date that run was produced (DT)
param.help: ISO8601 format date or date/time, like YYYY-MM-DD

param.name: FO
param.label: Flow order (FO)
param.help: The array of nucleotide bases that correspond to the nucleotides used for each flow of each read. Multi-base flows are encoded in IUPAC format, and non-nucleotide flows by various other characters. Format: /\*|[ACMGRSVTWYHKDBN]+/

param.name: KS
param.label: The array of nucleotide bases that correspond to the key sequence of each read (KS)

param.name: PG
param.label: Programs used for processing the read group (PG)

param.name: PU
param.label: Platform unit (PU)
param.help: Unique identifier (e.g. flowcell-barcode.lane for Illumina or slide for SOLiD)
